argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tsmslem1.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tsmslem1.s | |- S = ( ~P A i^i Fin ) |
| 3 |  | tsmslem1.1 | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | tsmslem1.a | |- ( ph -> A e. W ) |
| 5 |  | tsmslem1.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> X e. S ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> F : A --> B ) |
| 10 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eleq | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> X e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_elfpw | |- ( X e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) <-> ( X C_ A /\ X e. Fin ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_simplbi | |- ( X e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) -> X C_ A ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> X C_ A ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_fssresd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> ( F |` X ) : X --> B ) |
| 15 | 11 | #P_simprbi | |- ( X e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) -> X e. Fin ) |
| 16 | 10, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> X e. Fin ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` G ) e. _V |
| 18 | 17 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> ( 0g ` G ) e. _V ) |
| 19 | 14, 16, 18 | #P_fdmfifsupp | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> ( F |` X ) finSupp ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 20 | 1, 6, 7, 8, 14, 19 | #P_gsumcl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. S ) -> ( G gsum ( F |` X ) ) e. B ) |
